name: A·J·伯纳德
introduction: AJ's upcoming movie, Superman, is set to release on July 11, 2025. AJ is not only a talented actor, but he also takes direction exceptionally well, striving to become one of Hollywood's best actors under the guidance of top directors like James Gunn.AJ Bernard, featured in the teaser trailer for Superman, was born in Ft. Campbell, KY, and is a rising youth actor based in Savannah, GA. Known for his adorable smile, infectious energy, and authentic performances, AJ is quickly becoming an actor to watch.He made his debut in Miracles Across 125th Street, playing Nick Cannon's son, and has also appeared in Strays and in Season 10, Episode 14 of Chicago PD.When AJ isn't acting, he enjoys spending time with his family and friends, singing, playing video games, piano, basketball, practicing karate, swimming, and riding his bike and go-kart.
